title.rendered: Marilyn Manson – Eat Me, Drink Me (2007)

content.rendered:
Aquí tenéis el nuevo disco de Marilyn Manson, recién sacado del horno. De nuevo vuelve a dar un giro a su música, ofreciendonos canciones más rockeras, llenas de solos. A primera escucha se notan influencias de gente como David Bowie y The Cure.

If I Was Your Vampire

Putting Holes In Happiness

The Red Carpet Grave

They Said That Hell’s Not Hot

Just A Car Crash Away

Heart-Shaped Glasses (When The Heart Guides The Hand)

Evidence

Are You A Rabbit?

Mutilation Is The Most Sincere Form Of Flattery

You And Me And The Devil Makes 3

Eat Me, Drink Me
